name: Anxiety-a short experience
description:
GAME IS UNFINISHED, WE WILL UPLOAD A PLAYABLE VERSION IN FEW DAYS.

[A SHORT EXPERIENCE]

It's not exactly a game. We called it an experience. It has open interpretation for any personal mental health problems. 

[IMPORTANT MESSAGE]

If you need help, tell your loved ones first. Then ask for help from a specialist.
It's extremely important. When you get the right support, your view of the world can change significantly. Life can surprise you anew.

[CREDITS]

EGID Studio Game Jam Team:

Unity developer, VFX: Szymon Rzosinski (Devil304)

3D Artist, game concept: Kamila Joanna Chmielowiec (yreron)

Composer, sound designer, game concept: Justyna Kryscio (Juice Tea)

CREATED DURING MIX AND GAMEJAM 2020.

THEME: MIXING GENRES

We classificated it as art game and walking simulator.
